tool_description: API gratuita que retorna os dados Correios através de CEP
name: CEP Brazil
title: CEP Brazil

api_list.name: Retorna Dados do Endereço através do CEP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cep-brazil.p.rapidapi.com/correio/consulta/cep/75094080"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cep-brazil.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cep-brazil.p.rapidapi.com/correio/consulta/cep/{cepnumber}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cep-brazil.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
